Faculty Guide
  • IITM Main Web Page
  1. Responsibilities & Career Progression
  2. FAP

Faculty academic profile

The Faculty Academic Profile (https://fap.iitm.ac.in) is for Faculty to update academic data and achievements annually. The reports created from the submitted FAP data can be viewed at https://workflowreports.iitm.ac.in/ HumanResources FAP

It is mandatory to fill this and the data will be used during career progress through MBS (merit based selection).
